title: Use only the uploaded EYEGIC logo file across the app

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded EYEGIC logo as a static asset and ensure it is the only logo image used anywhere in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" is included in the frontend static assets (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/generated/) and is loadable by the UI.
No other logo image files are added or referenced anywhere in the repository or UI.

file_operations.description: Add the required static logo asset at this exact path and filename so it can be used as the sole logo image throughout the UI.

requirements.summary: Create a reusable BrandLogo component for the uploaded logo and use it in the site header and footer (desktop and mobile header areas).
acceptanceCriteria: SiteHeader displays the uploaded logo image (not a text-only brand name) for both desktop header and the mobile sheet header area.
SiteFooter displays the uploaded logo image (not a text-only brand name).
BrandLogo uses only the uploaded file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" as its image source and does not fetch logos from the backend or from any other asset.

file_operations.description: Implement BrandLogo to render a single that uses only frontend/public/assets/generated/EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.dim_1536x1024.png as its source (no backend fetch, no alternative assets).
Replace the text-based brand rendering with the BrandLogo component for both the desktop header brand area and the mobile sheet header area.
Replace the text-based brand rendering with the BrandLogo component in the footer branding area.

requirements.summary: Remove/avoid any remaining non-uploaded logo references and disable/absent any logo-management UI/hooks/utilities in the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: A search through the frontend codebase shows no references to any other logo asset filenames/paths besides "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png".
The app does not expose any logo upload/fetch/settings UI, and no backend calls exist in the frontend that attempt to retrieve or set a site logo.

file_operations.description: Remove unused logo-fetching hook file to prevent future accidental backend logo retrieval logic from being introduced.
Remove unused logo utility file to prevent alternate logo sources (data URLs / placeholders) from being used.
Remove the (currently empty) branding logo settings page to keep logo management UI disabled/absent.
Delete previously bundled/generated placeholder logo asset to ensure no alternate logo image can be referenced or displayed.
Delete previously bundled/generated placeholder logo asset to ensure no alternate logo image can be referenced or displayed.
Delete previously bundled/generated icon/logo-like asset to reduce the risk of an alternate logo appearing or being referenced.
Delete alternate EYEGIC logo asset variant so the codebase cannot reference anything other than the required uploaded logo file.
